title: dhigulu maanpara
sahitya:
digulu mAnparA nagumOmu jUparA nA

anupallavi

 nagadhara ninnu nammina bhaktulu vagalacE gunduTa tatakatu rA

caraNam 1

 tagavu lElarA inka biguvu yAlarA pagadura 
cEta bratuTuta gavulakeTa mAyenurA
 
caraNam 2

 tAmasuDanu rA nIdudAri deluparA rAmacandrapura 
vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa hrdaya sadana nA
